page.title: 02 Media_East Kilbride_News
page.content: In East Kilbride an outbreak of Meningitis has come.Six people have died and a few are seriously ill in hospital.Health board spokesmen cannot see the cause. The Dollan baths in East Kilbride have been closed because of Asbestos in the walls and ceiling of the building.It has been stated that it will be closed for six months. A lot of people in East Kilbride have put their names down for a house or flat.Over 3000 applicants are waiting for one of the two.Just a short while ago there were roughly 2ooo applicants but over the past few months more people have put their names down. Asbestos has been discovered round the water tanks in some houses. Tenants are concerned about this.
